main event: Several witnesses reported seeing unusual flying objects over La Madera, New Mexico on multiple occasions in April 1964.
interesting points: Curt Suthers, chief of the La Madera fire department, reported seeing 25 circular objects maneuvering at high speed in the sky., The objects were described as orange-red and varying in size from 30-50 feet., One witness, Lonnie Zamora, reported a shiny, oval-shaped object that rose off the ground with a roar and flames., Witnesses described a charred area with strange impressions left on the ground where a UFO was reported to have landed., Investigators found evidence of extreme heat in the area of the sightings, suggesting a physical event occurred.
sighted object: circular objects resembling flying saucers, shiny oval-shaped object
witness description: fire department officials and local police officers
